Save in posts#create controller

Update file app/controllers/posts_controller.rb

Change 

     render text: params[:post].inspect

To 

     @post = Post.new(params[:post])
 
     @post.save
     redirect_to action: :show, id: @post.id

Becomes 

   end
 
   def create
     @post = Post.new(params[:post])
 
     @post.save
     redirect_to action: :show, id: @post.id
   end
 end
